channel.title: Tele other command?+ master command
channel.description:
pi soruce 317
Need a command that will be like
::jail (username)
it will tele a person to the coordinates to my choice.
also need a ::master cmomands that only gets ATT,STR,DEF,RANGE,MAGE,HP. NOT PRAYER and not the other skill.s
THANKS

item.title: Tele other command?+ master command
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:6, topic:370593”]master doesnt work

and tell me jail?[/quote]
That master does work as long as your methods are correct and they should be the same if you are on PI

if not then post your errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Tele other command?+ master command
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

I have a master command, but it includes prayer, and im not sure if This Would work but just incase you change your mind here is the full master command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("i")) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); }

and if doesnt work for your server, try modifying it. Hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Tele other command?+ master command
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("jail")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; int randomjail = Misc.random(6); if (randomjail == 1) { c2.teleportToX = 3014; c2.teleportToY = 3180; } else if (randomjail == 2) { c2.teleportToX = 3018; c2.teleportToY = 3180; } else if (randomjail == 3) { c2.teleportToX = 3018; c2.teleportToY = 3189; } else if (randomjail == 4) { c2.teleportToX = 3014; c2.teleportToY = 3189; } else if (randomjail == 5) { c2.teleportToX = 3014; c2.teleportToY = 3191; } else if (randomjail == 6) { c2.teleportToX = 3014; c2.teleportToY = 3195; } c2.sendMessage("You have been jailed by "+c.playerName+""); c.sendMessage("Successfully Jailed "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Online."); } }
Thats the code i have made for my jail that i use
It teleports you to a random jail cell in the port sarim jail
if you would like me to also post how to add a jail then i will.

for the master command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("master") && c.playerRights > 2) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.playerXP[1] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[0] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.playerXP[2] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[2] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerXP[4] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[4] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[6] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); }

Read full topic

item.title: Tele other command?+ master command
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

First of all. I already explained the policy of having one active topic. You can have your topics locked if you have more than one active one at a time, SO STOP POSTING MULTIPLE ACTIVE TOPICS. Second of all, I have said this many many times already but who listens… USE THE SEARCH BAR. IT IS THERE FOR A PURPOSE. There are tons of tutorials (and I mean literally tons) that you can find by searching the simple word ::jail

Read full topic
